verbose_text: In contrast, DAI induced NF-kappaB activation is mediated through interactions between two receptor interacting protein (RIP) homotypic interaction motifs (RHIMs) in the DAI protein and RHIM containing kinases, RIP1 and RIP3, as shown by the demonstration that knockdown of either RIP1 or RIP3 inhibits DAI induced NF-kappaB activation.
